channel.title: CVE Feed for OCI -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OCI -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38429|2024-08-04T01:44:22.419Z -- oci -- opendds
item.description: OCI OpenDDS versions prior to 3.18.1 are vulnerable when an attacker sends a specially crafted packet to flood target devices with unwanted traffic, which may result in a denial-of-service condition and information exposure.

item.title: CVE-2021-38447|2024-08-04T01:44:22.378Z -- oci -- opendds
item.description: OCI OpenDDS versions prior to 3.18.1 are vulnerable when an attacker sends a specially crafted packet to flood target devices with unwanted traffic, which may result in a denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2021-38445|2024-08-04T01:44:22.436Z -- oci -- opendds
item.description: OCI OpenDDS versions prior to 3.18.1 do not handle a length parameter consistent with the actual length of the associated data, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.
